Uses of Interface
io.reinert.requestor.core.PollingRequestBuilder

  • Packages that use PollingRequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    io.reinert.requestor.core  

    • Uses of PollingRequestBuilder in io.reinert.requestor.core

      Subinterfaces of PollingRequestBuilder in io.reinert.requestor.core 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PollingRequestInvoker
      A RequestBuilder capable of sending itself.
      Methods in io.reinert.requestor.core that return PollingRequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.accept(String mediaType)
      Set the content type accepted for the response.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.auth(Auth.Provider authProvider)
      Sets the necessary information for authenticating the request against the server.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.auth(Auth auth)
      Sets the necessary information for authenticating the request against the server.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.contentType(String mediaType)
      Set the content type of this request.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.delay(int delayMillis)
      Delay the request dispatching in milliseconds.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.header(Header header)
      Sets a request header.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.header(String header, String value)
      Sets a request header with the given name and value.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.payload(Object payload, String... fields)
      Input a object to be sent in the HTTP Request payload.
      PollingRequestBuilder RequestBuilder.poll(PollingStrategy strategy)
      Poll the request according to the specified strategy with no interval.
      PollingRequestBuilder RequestBuilder.poll(PollingStrategy strategy, int intervalMillis)
      Poll the request according to the specified interval in milliseconds.
      PollingRequestBuilder RequestBuilder.poll(PollingStrategy strategy, int intervalMillis, int limit)
      Poll the request dispatching in a regular period of time in milliseconds for a limited number of times.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.retry(int[] delaysMillis, Event... events)
      Set a retry policy for this request.
      PollingRequestBuilder PollingRequestBuilder.timeout(int timeoutMillis)
      Sets the number of milliseconds to wait for a request to complete.
